overview: James, Kat, Sherrie, and Brian reunite for a movie night as they welcome a new guest, Julie, Brian's girlfriend. As the night progresses and the movie is being dissected by the group, a heated discussion about male gaze surfaces, but in the midst of the discussion and movie, they discover an unlikely connection to real life, one that attaches Julie and her real life job.
tagline: Secrets among friends come out when the credits roll.
title: Credits Among Friends
